actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend section 582(c) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 with respect to the transitional rules for foreign banks.

summary.text: Provides, under the Internal Revenue Code provisions relating to bond losses and gains of financial institutions, that in the case of a corporation which would be a bank except for the fact that it is a foreign corporation, the net gain for the taxable year shall be considered, under specified circumstances, as gain from the sale or exchange of a capital asset.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 582(c) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 with respect to the transitional rules for foreign banks.
